name: The Da Vinci Cryptex
description:
Trapped in a room, you need to think out of the box to solve logical enigmas written in a book and escape.

Find the answers, unlock the Cryptex, and see what awaits you in the next room!

"The Da Vinci Cryptex" is a brainteasing game consisting of 50 unique riddles, the more you go on, the harder to solve the puzzles

So, how many enigmas can you actually crack?

Warning: this IQ game may be addictive!

Features:
- 50 unique handcrafted puzzles
- Hints available (click the bulb button to get a hint)
- Astonishing graphics
- Captivating background music

If you're a fan of puzzles, word games, brain thinking, mind games, logic riddles, and enigmas, The Da Vinci Cryptex is the game for you!
